title: Preset
description: Associates an icon, form fields, and other UI with a set of OSM tags

name.description: The English name for the feature

geometry.description: Valid geometry types for the feature

tags.description: Tags that must be present for the preset to match

addTags.description: Tags that are added when changing to the preset (default is the same value as 'tags')

removeTags.description: Tags that are removed when changing to another preset (default is the same value as 'tags')

fields.description: Form fields that are displayed for the preset

icon.description: Name of preset icon which represents this preset

maki.description: Custom type used to allow National Park Service Icons (npmaki) along with other maki based libraries

inCarto.description: Whether or not the preset can be rendered to Cartography

inEditor.description: Whether or not the preset is available in the editor

matchScore.description: The quality score this preset will receive when being compared with other matches (higher is better)

layerIndex.description: The higher the number the 'higher' the object will appear when rendered

path.desciption: A unique identifier for this preset that contains the category, subcategory, and the tag name

gisTags.desciption: Tags used to connect Places with GIS
